features.heading: GREEN CLEAN
features.text: We know the harm cleaning products and airborne dust can do to our environment and our mission is to make this world a cleaner and a healthier place.

features.heading: EXPERIENCE
features.text: For over 20 years we have provided commercial cleaning services in schools, churches, government buildings, offices all around the Great Toronto Area such as Stouffville, Markham and Toronto.

features.heading: WELL TRAINED STAFF
features.text: All ISA employees are WHMIS, safety, and task trained. Our training is specific to your location, to ensure that your expectations are met. Additional training is provided when new procedures and equipment are available.

features.heading: INSURANCE
features.text: A cleaning contractor should be able to provide a current insurance certificate, and a current WSIB Certificate of Clearance. If they can not, then you may be liable for accidents, injuries or damages.

features.heading: PERFORMANCE ASSURANCE PROGRAM
features.text: Our four-step program is designed to keep you assure that we are always performing at a maximum level to keep your facility clean and as healthy as possible.

features.heading: FLEXIBLE PROGRAMS
features.text: ISA offers flexible cleaning service programs to fit your budget. Each program is customized to fit the requirements of your facility.
